item.title: 网络流
item.description: #include <bits/stdc++.h> using namespace std; const int maxn = 203; const int maxm = 5005; int n,m,s,t; int head[maxn], ecnt = 2, cur[maxn]; // ecnt 从 2 开始，方便取反向边 struct Edge { int to, nxt; ll w; } edges[maxm<<1]; void addEdge(int u, int v, ll w) { Edge e = {v, head[u], w}; head[u] = ecnt; edges[ecnt++] = e; } int dis[maxn]; bool
